text: Hans Cavalli-Björkman (29 June 1928 – 18 August 2020) was a Swedish lawyer and banker. He was the chairman of the Swedish Association football club Malmö FF, a post he held between 1975 and 1998.Cavalli at MFF.se During Cavalli- Björkmans years at the club they won four Swedish championships. He was also CEO of Swedish bank SEB in the late 1980s. Cavalli-Björkman was born in Jönköping, Sweden. He died on 18 August 2020 in Malmö, Sweden at the age of 92.Hans Cavalli-Björkman är död ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swedish businesspeople Category:Bankers Category:Swedish lawyers Category:People from Jönköping
title: Hans Cavalli-Björkman
